meanings.definition: to be a perfect example of something
meanings.sent1: Her kindness epitomizes the spirit of generosity.
meanings.sent2: The majestic mountain peak epitomizes natural beauty.
meanings.sent3: His love for ice cream epitomizes his sweet tooth.
meanings.sent4: The old oak tree epitomizes strength and resilience.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant sunset epitomizes the end of a perfect day.

meanings.definition: to embody the essential characteristics of something
meanings.sent1: The dedicated teacher epitomizes passion for education.
meanings.sent2: The loyal dog epitomizes loyalty and companionship.
meanings.sent3: His messy desk epitomizes organized chaos.
meanings.sent4: The roaring lion epitomizes power and authority.
meanings.sent5: The delicate flower epitomizes beauty in simplicity.
